subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The United States ended a three-match losing streak with a 16 ½-11 ½ victory at Valhalla Golf Club, taking down favored Europe for the first time in nine years.
snippet: The United States ended a three-match losing streak with a 16 ½-11 ½ victory at Valhalla Golf Club, taking down favored Europe for the first time in nine years.
